mapper.update: update tbl_cage set cg_state=#{cg_state} where cg_state="No" and cg_serial=#{cg_serial} and cg_date=#{cg_date}
mapper.select: select *from (select cg_serial, cg_motor from tbl_cageinfo where (cg_serial, cg_time) in (select cg_serial, max(cg_time) as date_time from tbl_cageinfo group by cg_serial)) t1 order by t1.cg_serial;
